description:
Ivan and Isaac had a lot of fun together!

So much so that I felt I was watching two guys in love having sex!

They started off in a nice big bubble bath, which is about as romantic as you can get.

I could tell they really liked each other by the way they spoke... and there was a lot of giggling going on too!

At one point in the tub, Isaac had his face planted in Ivan's ass, and Isaac was just going to town. I noticed that Ivan was checking it out in the mirror, watching himself get rimmed!

When they moved out to the sofa, Isaac starting fucking Ivan. Slowly, and then hard. Ivan is a great bottom... he loves every stroke!

I'm pretty sure the two of them hooked up again later that night in the hotel...
title: Ivan & Isaac
